snippet.title: Drill Keeper – Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Drill Keeper on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2409320/Drill_Keeper/

Drill Keeper combines roguelite deckbuilding and tower defense into a strategic battle for survival. Dig through completely destructible worlds to strip them of their riches and build an impenetrable fortress of mining.
